name: Bugs Corp
description:
Welcome!

It's time to squash some bugs. Dive headfirst into this bug-filled isometric roguelite.

Not only the rooms are filled with bugs - but so is the game as we worked a little bit last minute ...hehe.

Controls

WASD - Move

Left and right mousebutton - Attack

Shift - Dash

1 and 2 to loot and swap out your weapons for stronger ones.

Enjoy!
